items.summary: Introduce young students to robotics with a Cosmic Battle in the classroom, using LEGO SPIKE Essential kits. Build starfighters and let them duel, introducing coding and unpredictability to ages 6-9 with Word Blocks.

Discover the creative potential of 3D printing in robotics! Integrate printed components with SPIKE Prime to expand creativity and overcome challenges, enhancing your robotics classes. Share your thoughts!

Bring classic games Snake and Arkanoid to life in Python with SPIKE Prime. Engage students in hands-on coding, exploring game mechanics and history, sparking curiosity just like these games did for many.

Build a moving owl model with your students. Explore mechanical principles with the Flying Bird project using SPIKE Prime or mBot 2 sets and a laser cutter. Enhance design skills through hands-on learning.
Teach centrifugal force with the Carousel model using SPIKE Prime or mBot 2 and a laser cutter. This hands-on project visualizes physics concepts, providing scientific and analytical skills.

Give students the chance to build unique projects like cranes, carousels, and flying birds. Use laser cutters and LEGO SPIKE Prime or mBot 2 sets to create educational experiences with ready lesson plans.
Explore centrifugal force with the Carousel model. Use LEGO SPIKE Prime or mBot 2 sets with laser-cut elements to enhance physics lessons, providing hands-on scientific experiences for students.
Recreate classic games Snake and Arkanoid in Python using SPIKE Prime. Engage students with hands-on coding, learning game mechanics while fostering a love for tech and programming.
Measure wind strength with a LEGO SPIKE Prime-based anemometer. Incorporate 3D printing and Tinkercad design, blending STEM learning and real-world data collection seamlessly in class.

Let students build innovative robots like cranes and carousels using LEGO SPIKE Prime or mBot 2 sets. With prepared lesson plans and a laser cutter, bring unique, educational experiences to the classroom.

Create a moving owl model with students using SPIKE Prime or mBot 2 sets and a laser cutter. The Flying Bird project illustrates mechanical principles while enhancing design skills through hands-on learning.
Introduce young students to coding and robotics with Cosmic Battle! Build sci-fi starfighters from LEGO SPIKE Essential kits and let them duel, combining fun with learning through unpredictability.
